title: The Velvet claw
brief_description: Carnivores consist of 236 species which have evolved over 60 million years. This BBC TV series traces the amazing story of their evolution from the dinosaur era to the present day. Narrated by Derek Jacobi. The video is in seven parts: “The Carnassial connection”, “Sharpening the tooth”. “Strength in numbers”, “The Rich man’s table”, Jacks of all trades”, “Small and deadly”, It’s tough at the top
